title: Law of the Journey
brief_description: Weiwei’s installation work Law of the Journey continues the artist’s exploration of the the global refugee crisis and its impact on the people involved. The work features a 196 foot inflatable sculpture, along with walls of photographs and moving image projections.

constellations_other.name: Seeking asylum
constellations_other.description: Chauka Please Tell Us the Time was covertly filmed on a smartphone inside the Manus Island Detention Centre and sent via WhatsApp.
